page.title: 09Sports centres in Swindon
page.content: Swindon has good leisure facilities with the three main sports centres of Oasis, Link, and Croft. These offer a variety of activities such as swimming, bowls, snooker, weight-training, keep-fit, badminton, roller-skating, squash and tennis, and outdoor sports like football, hockey, athletics. There is a small charge to use these facilities or to join in the training courses. The Oasis and Link centres are large purpose built complexes of unusual architecture. The Oasis was built on old railway sidings and has a giant dome covring the swimming-pool. The Link centre was opened in 1985 and is of steel piles and wire structure. It offers an ice-rink which is already attracting international stars. The Croft centre is small but popular.
